message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand it's a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $105. It's a great product, and I think you'll really enjoy it. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell it to you for $102. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Let me know if that works for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $100. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is the price I was originally considering when I saw the product from John.
